```{r setup}
library(multivaR)
library(dplyr)
```


This is a rough draft vignette of how to run a typical workflow using multivaR


Step one is to assemble all the data for different variables into a single dataframe

```{r}

# step 1: assemble data

# search for azmpdata
library(azmpdata)
query(search_key = '')

# load in desired data frames
data("nitrate_inventory_timeseries_hl2")
data("chlorophyll_inventory_timeseries_hl2")

# collate data frames

datfr <- right_join(chlorophyll_inventory_timeseries_hl2, nitrate_inventory_timeseries_hl2)

```


Once data is assembled, PCA can be run


```{r}
PCA(datfr)

```
